title: Plants vs. Zombies
short_plot_summary: Defend your home from a horde of invading zombies with an arsenal of various plants that have special attack abilities.
explanation: A sunflower, representing one of the main plant characters in the game which generates resources
Cherries, symbolizing the Cherry Bomb, one of the powerful plant defenses in the game
A bomb, illustrating the explosive power of some plants used to fend off zombies
A zombie, representing the main enemy and obstacle in the game
A house, symbolizing the player's home which must be protected from the zombies
